nodes.bodyText:
does it work with mixed deployments?

old clusters e.g sdx have been deployed with old settings
new clusters e.g new DHs are deployed with the new settings
I haven't tested yet. I will do that, although I'm not sure how to confirm if it works or not.

I launched a Data Lake with old encryption rc4-hmac. Keytab for Ranger:

It seems that these keytabs use the same encryptions. Also tested HDFS access from Data Hub with env admin user and normal user. Env admin can access the cloud storage, but regular user cannot. Did the same with Hive where env admin user was able to create external table to S3
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE `inventory`(
  `inv_item_sk` int,
  `inv_warehouse_sk` int,
  `inv_quantity_on_hand` int)
  PARTITIONED BY (
  `inv_date_sk` int) STORED AS ORC
  LOCATION
  's3a://cb-group/khorvath/tpcds_bin_partitioned2_orc_200.db/inventory';

while normal user was not
Error: Error while compiling statement: FAILED: HiveAccessControlException Permission denied: user [jozsi] does not have [READ] privilege on [s3a://cb-group/khorvath/tpcds_bin_partitioned3_orc_200.db/inventory] (state=42000,code=40000)

kinit khorvath seems to be using the aes256 encryption on Data Hub and Data Lake also!
